job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: SUMMARY: Apex Systems has an immediate opening for a Machine Learning Engineer for a client in the financial services industry. The position is a contract-to-hire, offering a competitive compensation package. The successful candidate must come from a machine learning environment and have Java development experience.This is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with a large IT company to grow with internally!***Must be USC or Green Card No C2C****ROLE: Machine Learning EngineerTERM: Long term contract to hireLOCATION: Remote (company in Rockville, MD)QUALIFICATIONS:Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field. Core Java 4+ years Machine Learning experienceAWS Core ServicesExperience with web based technologies, specifically HTML
